HomeWiki:
Project Description
Burning and Erasing CD/DVD/Blu-ray Media with WPF and IMAPI2


A little while ago I was working on a WPF project that required the ability to archive data onto DVD but there were no WPF versions available freely. Luckily I found an excellent winforms version by Eric Haddan. This project is a port over of that winforms version to WPF, and implements the MVVM design pattern. I have avoided using any MVVM frameworks because I wanted people to be able to just compile the project and burn their media. To get the application looking good I am using a free WPF theme from reuxables, to remove or change this you will need to comment out the resource dictionary reference on the .App.xaml and delete any Style tags.

This is still a work in progress, but you should have 90 to 95% parity with the original release.
